subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
The federal agency Superintendency for the Development of Amazonia (SUDAM) aims to promote inclusive and sustainable development of their area of ​​expertise and competitive integration of regional production base in the national and international economy.
From the second half of 2008 the execution of the project BRA/06/029 started, focusing on the implementation of the following results: 1.1-management system with performance indicators developed and implemented institutional; 1.4 - Monitoring and evaluation activities of the project carried out; 1.6 - international financial and technical cooperation expanded, with training in foreign languages​​, and 3.1 - aimed at strengthening institutional publicity image SUDAM in society (creation of new website, magazine, institutional and corporate video).
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/06/029 SUDAM STRENGTHENING
